meanings.definition: To spit out saliva or mucus.
meanings.sent2: The baby gobbed up her food and made a mess.
meanings.sent3: The dog gobbed on the carpet, much to the owner's dismay.
meanings.sent4: The fountain gobbed water into the air, creating a beautiful display.
meanings.sent5: The old man gobbed out his dentures before going to bed.

meanings.sent1: The slimy frog was gobbed all over.
meanings.sent2: The tissue was gobbed with snot after a sneeze.
meanings.sent3: The gobbed mirror needed a good cleaning.
meanings.sent4: The gobbed surface was slippery to walk on.
meanings.sent5: The gobbed hands left marks on the clean paper.
